scripts.develop: SET NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
scripts.build: SET NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && cd client && npm run build
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client && npm install --only=dev && npm install && npm run build
